menu.label: Possible factors
menu.prompt: What are five possible factors or reasons? Provide an unordered list.

menu.label: Solutions
menu.prompt: What can I do / what are five possible solutions to improve the situation? Provide an unordered list.

menu.label: Exercises
menu.prompt: Provide five explicit exercises I can do by myself. Provide an unordered list.

menu.label: Daily routine
menu.prompt: Provide three facts that help me improving my daily routine in regard to the context. Provide an unordered list.

menu.label: Professional help
menu.prompt: Where can I get professional help?
